text: Kabardin Autonomous Soviet Socialist Republic (Kabardin ASSR), () was the name given to Kabardino-Balkarian ASSR after deportation of the Balkars in 1944. In 1957, the old name was restored. ==See also== *Kabardino-Balkaria Category:Autonomous republics of the Soviet Union Category:Kabardino-Balkaria Category:States and territories established in 1944 ru:Кабардинская АССР
title: Kabardin Autonomous Soviet Socialist Republic
